name: .SKIN File Extension
summary: Learn about .SKIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Skin file used by ASP.NET applications; contains definitions of the visual styles of individual application controls, such as buttons, labels, text boxes, and calendars; can specify colors, fonts, layout styles, and other formatting options; used for changing the look and feel of the Web application.

content: SKIN files are part of an overall ASP.NET theme. Other files that contribute to a theme are .CSS files, images, and other application resources.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
